revised_title: Stellar Orientation and the Foundation Dates of Ancient Greek Temples
tldr: The author examines the orientations of several Greek temples to determine if they were aligned with the rising or setting of specific stars. By understanding the precession of the equinoxes and how it affects the positions of stars, the author attempts to find the dates when these temples were founded. This research provides insight into the astronomical knowledge of the ancient Greeks and their connection to the stars.
